Text: Thanks much for this! The British, Aussie, and New Zealand versions of this show are so much better than the U.S. version. Too bad that b/t is the only way to see them.

Thanks for uploading this! Have to disagree with Malibu though - the British version is embarrasingly bad from the hosting to the film production. They need to fire the lot and start over. The Australian and Canadian versions are the best.
Guys, does anybody have BNTM season 4? If yes, please upload & seed >.
